params.collateralRequirement: input collateral requirement to be transformed.
params.oraclePrice: input price returned by DVM used to transform the collateral requirement.

returns._0: transformedCollateralRequirement input collateral requirement with the transformation function applied.

params.oraclePrice: input price returned by the DVM to be transformed.
params.requestTime: timestamp the oraclePrice was requested at.

returns._0: transformedOraclePrice input oraclePrice with the transformation function applied.

params.priceIdentifier: input price identifier defined for the financial contract.
params.requestTime: timestamp the identifier is to be used at. EG the time that a price request would be sent using this identifier.

returns._0: transformedPriceIdentifier input price identifier with the transformation function applied.

transformCollateralRequirement((uint256).notice: Transforms a given collateral requirement using the financial product libraries transformation logic.

transformPrice((uint256),uint256).notice: Transforms a given oracle price using the financial product libraries transformation logic.

transformPriceIdentifier(bytes32,uint256.notice: Transforms a given price identifier using the financial product libraries transformation logic.

userdoc.notice: Provides price and collateral requirement transformation interfaces that can be overridden by custom Financial product library implementations.
